title: Letting God Be Involved In Your Everyday Life | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Letting God Be Involved In Your Everyday Life | Joel Osteen
description:
God wants to be involved in every part of your life. If you’ll acknowledge Him, He will cause you to flourish in every area. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
